author: Mahek Mehta
text:
Delhi Gurgaon Cab Drivers are just making story of strike (Hadtaal) of not fulfilling their demands by Ola & Uber and asking to cancel ride & pay cash. It's same story they are telling since last 2-3 months. Is it happening in your cities too? 

@Uber @Olacabs @Uber_Support

author: Mahek Mehta
text: Just think once about total nonviolence & micro understanding of stop hurting every living beings not only physically but also emotionally or by words and then see how do we select best religion for life. Which religion becomes most relevant here? Only Jainism.
